response.raw:
Here is my attempt at the task, wrapped in the specified output tags:

<OUTPUT_TEXT>
As an elementary school teacher, some key ways I enforce school policies and rules for students include:

- Clearly communicating expectations to students at the beginning of the year and reinforcing them regularly 
- Posting classroom rules prominently and referring to them often
- Modeling appropriate behavior myself and praising students when they follow the rules
- Establishing clear consequences for misbehavior and applying them consistently and fairly
- Partnering with parents to ensure rules are reinforced at home
- Handling rule violations calmly and respectfully through private conversations with students
- Focusing on positive reinforcement and recognizing good behavior to encourage students to follow the rules
</OUTPUT_TEXT>

<OUTPUT_TEXT>
As an elementary school teacher, some key ways I enforce school policies and rules for students include:

- Clearly communicating expectations to students at the beginning of the year and reinforcing them regularly 
- Posting classroom rules prominently and referring to them often
- Modeling appropriate behavior myself and praising students when they follow the rules
- Establishing clear consequences for misbehavior and applying them consistently and fairly
- Partnering with parents to ensure rules are reinforced at home
- Handling rule violations calmly and respectfully through private conversations with students
- Focusing on positive reinforcement and recognizing good behavior to encourage students to follow the rules
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
